title: Understanding the Data
text: First, identify how many members read between $$50$$ and $$150$$ pages. Count the number of members in this range.

title: Total Members
text: Determine the total number of members in the book club. This will help you calculate the percentage.

title: Calculate the Percentage
text: Use the formula: (number of members who read between $$50$$ and $$150$$ pages) divided by (total number of members) times $$100$$.
